text: Ne abakhayi baboola mbu: “indukho eyo shilikhwitsila tawe,” Boola mbu: “khushina? Nditsuba khu Nyasaye wanje, toto ilibetsela, Omumanyi wakefisile, sishifisanga khuye tawe kata eshili nende obusiru shinga bweyindukusi, mwikulu nohomba khushialo, nohomba eshititi okhushila esho, nohomba eshikhongo muno, halali biosi ebo bili mushitabu shinoosinjia.”
